## About Me

I am a statistical programmer with 7 years experience in Pharmaceutical Market Access and Health Economics. I have a Masters Degree in Epidemiology from the Charité – Universitätsmedizin Berlin and a Master's in Biomedical Research from Cardiff University.

I fell into R and Python Programming coupled with data analysis and have kept going with it.

## Skills and Interests

-   Biostatistics, R, Python, Data Analysis, Data Visualisation, GIS, Epidemiology, Market Access, Health Economics
